data.event: Taylor County was created on January 15, 1852, by an act of the Georgia General Assembly from portions of Macon, Marion and Talbot counties.

event.title: March 8, 1852) Militia districts in the county included

data.event: (from a meeting minutes March 8, 1852) Militia districts in the county included Prattsburg 737, Hall 743, Reynolds 741, Butler 757, Cedar Creek 1071, and Whitewater 853.
